contest-event.event-date:
June 10, 1978 D Around the Towns Contest
Around the Towns Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
around-the-towns-contest
None
Chard, Winsham, Crewkerne, Stoke Sub Hamdon, and Yeovil Promoted by South Somerset Brass
Each band played an entertainments programme in each town. The adjudicators' results from each venue were brought to the final massed bands concert in the evening, where the results were tallied.
Oct. 19, 2012, 3:06 p.m. Oct. 19, 2012, 3:07 p.m.
